document_data.mainbody:
Gawenknife Street was a large road that was located in the city of Waterdeep during the 15 century DR.
Gawenknife Street was located in the eastern section of Waterdeeps Field Ward. It was easily the largest road in this section of the Field Ward, spanning east to west in between the High Road and an unnamed courtyard near Endshift Street. Other roads that intersected Gawenknife Street included Logans Walk, the Semize, and Chop Street.
